rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, Shin. Where were you?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0002
rows.name:
I went to the outskirts of
the capital to find some ingredients.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0003
rows.name: C'mon, we're in the capital city!

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0004
rows.name:
We can eat all the delicious food
we want here, you don't need to do that.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0005
rows.name:
But Shin's cooking is incredible.
I get why he'd want to cook himself.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0006
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0007
rows.name: ...true, but...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0009
rows.name: Um... I spoke a little with Seiryuu-dono.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0010
rows.name: Oh yeah? What'd you talk about?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0011
rows.name: It was hard for me to understand.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0012
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0013
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]New relationships...?
For me, having this moment is enough...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0014
rows.name: Alright, what's the plan now?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0015
rows.name:
We'll have to go to Iira's core
to get the seal back...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0016
rows.name:
Hikari-san's judgment was that
we can believe Metsu's words
that he'll wait a while.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0017
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0018
rows.name:
He's enjoying himself, is he?
How infuriating.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0019
rows.name:
Exactly.
But isn't that the very
opening we can take advantage of?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0020
rows.name:
Right.
Let's use this time
to get ready to fight.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0021
rows.name: Yeah. We need to get stronger.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0022
rows.name:
And the people of the city
are terrified.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0023
rows.name:
It's also your duty to reassure them
 Laura.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0024
rows.name: What? My duty?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0025
rows.name:
That's right. You are now
officially a knight of Iira.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0026
rows.name:
You must not only be strong,
but also bring peace to the hearts
of the people.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0027
rows.name: That is the ideal form of a knight.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0028
rows.name: The ideal knight...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0029
rows.name: Don't feel so burdened by it.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0030
rows.name:
Hugo is right, but you're
not the only knight in Iira.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0031
rows.name: And you have us, your friends.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0032
rows.name:
We can all support the country of Iira,
together.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0033
rows.name:
Right... I'll think about it.
About what I can do, and what
I should do, in the time we have left...
